titleStmt.title: The intentions of the army discovered in a letter from a gentleman residing there, to a friend of his in London: made publike for the better satisfaction of those who desire to be truely informed of their proceedings, tendred to the view of all impartiall readers. Written at the head quarters, Iunii. 21. 1647.
titleStmt.author: W. C.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: S. Albans Junii 21. 1647. W.C.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
